Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: Police established the involvement of Organised Criminal Group in several crimes: kidnapping, assault related to robbery, and cattle rustling, which were committed on the territory of our region and in Shymkent city. In May of the last year, members of liquidated criminal group kidnapped a local businessman, 1984 year of birth, resident of Shymkent, and extorted money from the victim for his release. Then they took his car “BMW 525” and pawned it in one of the pawn-shops of the city, all proceeds they spent on their own needs. When criminals released the victim, the man immediately appealed to the police. Investigators initiated a criminal case and put the suspects in a wanted list for committing a number of grave crimes. A careful work on gathering of intelligence and evidentiary basis was held by officers of the Directorate for Combating Organised Crime of the DIA in SKR concerning this criminal group within a year. Police established the involvement of detainees in theft of more than 10 horses, worth for the total sum of more than 3 million KZT, which was committed by them the other day in Baidibek district. A criminal case under three articles of the Criminal Code of the RoK was initiated according to the facts: 126 “Illegal Deprivation of Freedom”, 179 “Brigandage” and 175 “Theft”. The suspects were taken into custody. A criminal investigation is ongoing.
